title: Receipt Inserted Event
description: Event emitted when a message receipt (read/delivered status) is recorded (via database trigger)

message_id.description: ID of the message this receipt is for

user_id.description: ID of the user who received/read the message

status.description: Receipt status: 'delivered' = message received, 'read' = message read by user

at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the receipt was recorded
